price: 41. Ceux qui se défendent contre une injustice, ceux-là ne sont sujets à aucune poursuite (légale).
arabic: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعۡدَ ظُلۡمِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walamani intaṣara baʿda ẓul'mihi fa-ulāika mā ʿalayhim min sabīlin
